testcase.purpose: Test checks that NavigatorPresentation interface basic attributes
Test checks that Availability basic attribute

description.pre_condition: Turn on 'Simulate Secondary Display' by 'Setting' app.

testcase.purpose: Test checks that the value property of an Availability object to offer presentation only when there are available displays

testcase.purpose: Test checks that navigator.presentation.getAvailability should return Availability Object

testcase.purpose: Test checks that No available presentation displays will throw a DOMException named 'NotFoundError'

description.pre_condition: Turn off 'Simulate Secondary Display' by 'Setting' app.

testcase.purpose: Test checks that Event defaultsessionstart is fired when the UA initiates a presentation on behalf of the page

testcase.purpose: Test checks that Session state value is 'connected' or 'disconnected'

testcase.purpose: Test checks that when send message with type arraybuffer, then initialise event's data attribute to a new ArrayBuffer object whose contents are presentation message data

testcase.purpose: Test checks that when send message with type blob, then initialise event's data attribute to a new Blob object that represents presentation message data as its raw data
